text: Tartar sauce (tartare in the United Kingdom and Australia) is a mayonnaise- based sauce. It is often served as a condiment with seafood dishes. It is like mayonnaise, but with a few more ingredients such as pickles, onions, capers, lemon juice and parsley. The word Tartar is a Turkic word. It is believed to be named after the Tatar people. == References == Category:Condiments
title: Tartar sauce
